info.title: Laravel Restful API
info.description: This API was concepted during classes of the course 'RESTful API with Laravel: Build a Real API with Laravel' that I took from the Udemy platform.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Transaction property to sort sort the data by

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many records to return per page

403.description: Returns when category is not authorized to perform this request

get.summary: Get the list of a category's products
get.description: Returns the list of category's products

parameters.name: stock
parameters.description: List all category's products with the specified stock amount

parameters.name: situation
parameters.description: List all category's products with the specified situation

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Category's product property to sort sort the data by

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many records to return per page

401.description: Returns when category is not authenticated

403.description: Returns when category is not authorized to perform this request

500.description: Returns when there's some problem with the application. Please report to the development team when getting this response.

get.summary: Get the list of a category's sellers
get.description: Returns the list of category's sellers

parameters.description: Category's product property to sort sort the data by

parameters.description: How many records to return per page

post.summary: Creates a product transaction for the buyer
post.description: Returns the product transaction for the buyer's data

401.description: Returns when user is not authenticated

403.description: Returns when user is not authorized to perform this request

409.description: Returns when there's some validation trouble

error.example: The buyer must be different from the seller
The buyer must be different a verified user
The product does not have enough units for this transaction

500.description: Returns when there's some problem with the application. Please report to the development team when getting this response.

development.description: Laravel  passport oauth2 security for development.

scopes.purchase-product: Create a new transaction for a specific product.
scopes.manage-products: Create, read, update and delete products (CRUD).
scopes.manage-account: Read your account data (except password) and modify it. Cannot delete.
scopes.read-general:
Read General information like purchasing categories, purchased products,
                                    selling products, selling categories, your transactions (purchases ans sales).

production.description: Laravel passport oauth2 security for production.

scopes.purchase-product: Create a new transaction for a specific product.
scopes.manage-products: Create, read, update and delete products (CRUD).
scopes.manage-account: Read your account data (except password) and modify it. Cannot delete.
scopes.read-general:
Read General information like purchasing categories, purchased products,
                                    selling products, selling categories, your transactions (purchases ans sales).
